title: About
content:
Hi! My name is Soufiane, I'm a software and web developer based in Morocco, Agadir. I had my 4 year studies in computer engineering (BTS, ENS, 1337), and six months Connect Institute where I had aquired broad perspective and learnt the importance of soft skills, alongside with having internships and freelance jobs as a developer and team coordinator, and working on many open personal projects related to computers and electronics, currently working as a Full Stack developer @Crealeet

I like learning, building and making new softwares and electronics, that I'm able to understand or find useful. My main goal is to bring value in the best way possible, I like working in teams, and take in consideration the value of an intuitive UI and UX, clean and effecient code and architecture.

I sometimes read books and articles and write a bit, I like having discussions with interesting people.
